page.title: 19IN THE HOME,SEAHAM
page.content: PEOPLE IN SEAHAM HAVE A WIDE VARIETY OF ENTERTAINMENTS IN THE HOME.THE MAIN SOURCE OF ENTERTAINMENT SEEMS TO BE THE TELEVISION.ALL HOMES CAN RECEIVE BBC1,BBC2 AND ITV BUT THERE ARE SOME AREAS IN SEAHAM THAT CANNOT RECEIVE CHANNEL 4.MANY HOMES HAVE VIDEOS AND FILMS CAN BE HIRED FOR Â£1 PER DAY FROM ONE OF THE MANY RETAILERS.IN RECENT YEARS MANY CHILDREN AND ADULTS HAVE BECOME FASCINATED BY THE USE OF THE HOME COMPUTERS AND SEAHAM IS NO EXCEPTION TO THE RECENT NATIONWIDE BOOM IN THIS INDUSTRY.COLLECTING AND PLAYING MUSIC RECORDS IS ANOTHER POPULAR PASSTIME.CHILDREN OFTEN HAVE PARTIES AT HOME ON THEIR BIRTHDAYS.ALL OF THEIR FRIENDS COME FOR TEA AND GAMES ARE PLAYED.MANY CHILDREN PLAY GAMES THEMSELVES AT HOME.READING BOOKS IS POPULAR WITH SOME.OLDER CHILDREN HAVE SCHOOL HOMEWORK EACH EVENING.
